author: kennetherland
body: Why is finding the download for powershell so difficult?  I literally had to click through 20 pages to finally get to the download.  Please keep this simple for end users.  I should not have to wade through GitHub to find a download of powershell.

comments.author: thlac
comments.body:
There's a, in my opinion, pretty simple [matrix](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#get-powershell) on the front page with direct downloads. Are you by chance being linked here from the Microsoft Docs?

Because I see their [documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/install/installing-powershell-core-on-windows) does link directly to the releases page.

comments.author: doctordns
comments.body:
I just use the Install-PowerShell script on GitHub:

On Windows just do this:
```powershell
# Download PowerShell 7 installation script
Set-Location C:\Foo
$URI = "https://aka.ms/install-powershell.ps1"
Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $URI | 
  Out-File -FilePath C:\Foo\Install-PowerShell.ps1
# install
c:\foo\install-powerShell.ps1 -useMSI -Quiet
```
